remarks: In a division ring the unit is different from the zero.  (Contributed by FL, 14-Feb-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dvrunz.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
dvrunz.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
dvrunz.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
dvrunz.4 $e |- Z = ( GId ` G ) $.
dvrunz.5 $e |- U = ( GId ` H ) $.
dvrunz $p |- ( R e. DivRingOps -> U =/= Z ) $.
